title: Tadej Pogačar Crushed the UAE Tour, and He’s Only Getting Started: ‘Time to Switch to the Classics’
content:
Was it ever in doubt? Pogačar caps inch-perfect week with 8km solo victory on final stage of UAE Tour. Next? Strade, San Remo, Flanders.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Crushed the UAE Tour, and He’s Only Getting Started: ‘Time to Switch to the Classics’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
